description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Course description**

This course is designed to support students in their use of English language in an academic context. Through close study of texts, engagement in production activities, and self-paced reading practice (Scholastic Literacy Pro), students will expand their language and critical thinking skills.

**Required text**

Daise, D., Norloff, C., & Carne, P., _Q: Skills for Success: Reading and Writing, 4._ New York: Oxford University Press.

**Course requirements**

Attendance & Participation (10%)

Midterm (25%) & Final (25%)

\--The exams will cover reading selections from the book.

Assignments (20%)

\--Include group presentations, Quality Talk (QT), book summary

TOEIC L/S & TOEIC-related activities (20%)

\--Include TOEIC L/S (4/23), online reading
